entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
